title: Set a Product to Pre-Order Status
description: A highly anticipated new product is not yet released, but the company wants to allow customers to pre-order it.

tasks.description: Locate the new product in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct product SKU.

tasks.description: Change the product's status to 'Pre-Order' and set the expected release/shipping date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the product status and release date.

tasks.description: Ensure the product page clearly communicates that it is a pre-order with an estimated ship date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The product page displays the 'Pre-Order' button and the expected ship date.
